titleStmt.title: László Drakulya to Miklós Oláh (Prague, 11 December 1543)

seriesStmt.title: Bibliotheca Scriptorum Medii Recentisque Aevorum: Series nova

note.p: Notes: Two copies have been preserved. One of them (p. 18–21.) contains Oláh’s emendations, the other (p. 14–17.) is a copy of this manuscript. Both copies contain the family tree of his relative, László Drakulya. The family tree in the earlier copy was copied or sketched by Oláh, see page 20. The two family trees differ from each other.
On the outer side: Ex relatione Ladislai Drakwlya genealogia mea Nicolai Olahi. Pragae datae 11. Decembris 1543.

div.head: László Drakulya to Miklós Oláh (Prague, 11 December 1543)

body.p: 1. László Drakula’s parents told him that he and Oláh shared a grandfather, namely Dracula or Vlad Țepeș, to whom King Matthias married one of his female relatives. This Vlad was famous for his cruelties, and he had three sons, one of whom was Voivode Mihnea, the second was Oláh’s father, and the third was Drakula’s father. 2. After Vlad was killed by the boyars, Mihnea became voivode, and he had 60 boyars killed in revenge. After this, he deemed it safe to tell King Vladislaus II everything and offered his Transalpine fortifications to him, in exchange for which the King should give him estates in Hungary. In the end, Jakšić killed Mihnea in Sibiu, and as Oláh knows well, this has harmed them greatly. From all this Oláh can see that their ancestors always had great power and were the allies of the Christian rulers. It would be good if Oláh told all this to the King so that once he rules everything, he should also look after them (Drakula and Oláh).

div.p: Reverendissime Domine, Domine mihi Observandissime!On this letter, see Szilágyi–Nagy 2022.

Avum igitur Vestrae Reverendissimae DominationisAccording to Drakulya’s family tree, he was Vlad Țepeș, but László Drakulya is wrong: Vlad was neither Oláh’s grandfather nor ancestor. et meum Mathias rexKing Mathias I. ceperat et unam cognatam suam eiavo meo in uxoremMarina Hunyadi. dedit, sicque ipsum Wlaad vaidatVlad Țepeș. nomine Ladislaum avum nostrum in vaivodatum Transalpinum miserat, eique contulit. Nominatus autem nomine hoc Drakulya ob nimiam ipsius crudelitatem fuit, quod super ipsum ad extremum vitae suae diem usque permansit. Ipse igitur avus noster Wlaad vaida sive Dracula tres filios habuit, quorum unus fuit Myhne vaida,Mihnea cel Rău. secundus vero paterIstván Oláh, see Dörner 1994; and Szilágyi 2021. Vestrae Reverendissimae Dominationis, tertius autem pater meus nomine Ludovicus Drakulya vaida, et quia nimis crudelis fuit, eam ob rem a boieris trucidatus fuit, et sic posteri ipsius huc devenerunt.

[2.] Cum autem Myhne vaida denuo ad vaivodatum vocatus fuit, ex voluntate patris Vestrae Reverendissimae Dominationis et mei ad officium vaivodatus profectus fuit. Hinc itaque Vestra Reverendissima Dominatio facile coniicere potest et diiudicare, nos circa regnum illud iustitiam habere, Myhne igitur vaida ob interitum avi nostri, simul et semel 60 boiaros occidi et trucidari iussit. Cuius quidem interitus nobis omnibus male assit, negotium igitur istud a domino MatheoMáté Oláh. quoque fratre Vestrae Reverendissimae Dominationis tali ordine accepi et ita, ut audivi, vere refero, cuius rei memoriam Vestra Reverendissima Dominatio forsan habere potest. Bene igitur iam Vestra Reverendissima Dominatio intelliget, quod regnum illud antecessores nostri magna cum potentia semper obtinuerunt et possederunt possiderunt semperque cum Christianis principibus coniuncti fuerunt. Bonum igitur esset, si Vestra Reverendissima Dominatio nacta occasione rem istam sacrae regiae maiestati exponeret, nam mihi quidem magna fiducia est, quod regia maiestas, volente Deo, omne suum imperium obtinebit et sic forsitan de nobis quoque provideretur.
